Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.wal

Class MetricsWALSourceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.BaseSourceImpl
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.wal.MetricsWALSourceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseSource, MetricsWALSource, org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.MetricsSource
@Private public class MetricsWALSourceImpl extends BaseSourceImpl implements MetricsWALSource
Class that transitions metrics from MetricsWAL into the metrics subsystem. Implements BaseSource through BaseSourceImpl, following the pattern.
See Also:
  • MetricsWALSource
